title: Can I get a refund on my recent blue essence purchases?
body:
Is it possible to get a refund on recent champion purchases (with blue essence) in light of the mystery champion shards now granting 4800+ champions? I used all of my remaining blue essence (20250, to be precise) yesterday to unlock as many champions under 4800 as possible; I was hoping to get a few good deals from the mystery champion shards before the store closed, but now all I've done is prevented myself from taking advantage of the new deal.
I don't even want the champions I purchased; I was just trying to get them out of the way so I could spend blue essence more efficiently.

replies.body: Hmmmmm I kinda see where you're coming from since this change was really out of the blue for everyone. I want you to go ahead and write a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to our billing team so they can look into what you did and see how we need to go about handling it!

Didn't want to reply until I heard back from support, but everything got sorted out.
Thank you so much!
Glad to hear everything got worked out ^_^!!!
